ModMetaData.name: ZeroTech-Trait (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: LingLuo
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of LingLuos mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2208723909
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/ZeroTechTrait][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] Zero Tech-Trait Expansion Pack People who have been abandoned by the gods, please live stronger Introduction Immune deficiency: very low immunity Mental mania Worthless: very low value Cold physique: afraid of cold Heat fear physique: fear of heat Leverage: easy to cause conflict Math idiot: poor calculation skills Body deformities: weak mobility and unsightly Arrogance: unable to learn Greedy: need multiple lovers
Language: Simplified Chinese, English Sharing Agreement:MIT Giturl https://github.com/LingLuo39/ZeroTech/
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
